title: Smoked Shoyu Tare

ingredients.name: smoked soy sauce (soy sauce smoked at 110°C/225°F until reduced by half)
smoked mushroom liquid (mushrooms smoked at 110°C/225°F until withered)

steps: To make smoked soy sauce: add soy sauce to a pan, place in a smoker at 110°C/225°F, and smoke until reduced by half.
To make smoked mushroom liquid: smoke mushrooms in a deep pan at 110°C/225°F, until withered.
Combine the above ingredients in a small saucepan, and bring to a boil to dissolve the salt and sugar.
Once fully dissolved, allow the tare to cool, then use it as needed.
notes: Developed as part of a popup with Flat and Point.
Requires a smoker to make properly.
Add 30 mL of tare per 300 mL soup.
